about_the_game:
Embark on your journey through STATION 37, a nostalgic first-person shooter crafted in the Quake engine.

Immerse yourself in the depths of an underground complex known as Station 37, an abandoned scientific outpost nestled on a distant celestial body. Prepare to engage in intense combat against both the facility's formidable mechanical security units and the mutated creatures that have taken over its corridors. Traverse this treacherous environment, armed with a vast arsenal of weapons and tools, as you unveil the secrets that lie within the abandoned research base.

Key Features:

  • Retro style graphics - Low-Res art style inspired on games like Quake and System Shock 1.
  • Difficult Gameplay - Prepare for a relentless challenge where survival depends on your resourcefulness and strategic use of available tools.
  • Open Source/Modding - Source code will be under the GPL license and supports the Trenchbroom level editor for custom maps.
